text: @chuckwoolery I saw your tweet and you know what you said. Every one is lying to us except the @POTUS. #COVID19 is real the doctors and what they are going through is real as well as the nurses. The lasting of this virus 🦠 even on mild cases is real. Please #stfu #TraitorInChief #TrumpKillsUs
